advisory.topic: An update for stalld is now available for Rocky Linux 8.6 Extended Update Support.
advisory.description:
The stalld package provides a mechanism used to prevent the starvation of operating system threads in a Linux system.
Bug fix(es) and Enhancement(s):

fixes.description: Rebase stalld to latest upstream version [rhel-8.6.0.z]
